Posts.Content: Kirsty1974 wrote: I found a lump in my right breast on Monday, GP confirmed but did not say much, said she would arrange mammogram. Wednesday morning i received an appointment for the Consultant Surgeon at local hospital, normally you would have had the mammogram first then if anything wrong the consultant. Can anyone help me please Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Surgeon before Mammogram is this normal Kirsty1974 illimae
